title: ICE on nested RPIT: cannot prove CoerceUnsized predicate

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-impl-trait
labels.description: Area: impl Trait. Universally / existentially quantified anonymous types with static dispatch.

body:
### Code https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=b8de6af93ef2a54292829ffbc9cbea25 ```Rust fn test() -> impl Iterator { Box::new(0..) as Box> } ``` Regressed between (263edd43c 2022-07-17) .. (62b272d25 2022-07-21). ~Probably #99495~. Cc @oli-obk. Edit: Regressed in #99506 Minimized from [HFQR/xitca-web](https://github.com/HFQR/xitca-web). Cc @fakeshadow. @rustbot label regression-from-stable-to-nightly A-impl-trait
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:3 ~ playground[5412]::test) (NoSolution): could not prove Binder(TraitPredicate(> as std::ops::CoerceUnsized>>>, polarity:Positive), []) --> src/lib.rs:2:5 | 2 | Box::new(0..) as Box> | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/canonical.rs:151:13 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1426:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f9723d958a0 -
